Desc.entry: Aims to benefit the community of Southey, and by bringing together statutory, voluntary and other organisations aims to bring the concerns of the local community to the fore. These concerns include education and training and providing facilities to tackle the social and economic problems of the area. Runs courses in Key Skills 1 & 2 Maths and English, IT, ESOL, confidence building, photography, flower arranging etc. Has a creche and runs an out of school club and many more activities.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 9am-5pm and some evenings for classes
